evidence.title: Fed likely to keep rates steady as economy shows mixed signals

evidence.title: Federal Reserve keeps interest rates unchanged even as Trump continues to insist they be lowered
keywords: want to lower rates to further support hiring
evidence.quote: The rate-setting committee remains split between those opposed to further cuts until inflation comes down, and those who want to lower rates to further support hiring. This indicates that some members are hesitant to cut rates further.

evidence.title: Fed, Signaling Little Urgency, Prepares to Pause on Rate Cuts
evidence.quote: The Federal Reserve is expected to hold interest rates steady on Wednesday, despite relentless attacks from President Trump over borrowing costs.

evidence.title: Warsh To Change Federal Reserve Policy Approach?
evidence.quote: Many of Powell's critics argue that he has always been slow to respond to the current needs of the financial system, but once 'on board,' he gets fully behind the effort.

evidence.title: Federal Open Market Committee meeting: Live coverage
keywords: keep its benchmark interest rate steady
evidence.quote: The Federal Reserve's rate-setting committee is expected to keep its benchmark interest rate steady Wednesday amid an intensifying effort from the White House to gain a governing majority on the central bank's board.
